title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 06 February 2017 - XWiki
content:

11:06 <vmassol> good morning  
11:06 <vmassol> FYI I've created https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-41747  
11:51 <vmassol> cool all http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Contrib/job/XWiki%20Contrib/ jobs work ATM, continuing the migration  
11:51 <vmassol> (migration from http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Contrib/)  
12:18 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
12:26 <ol-ow2> has joined #xwiki  
12:35 <evalica> has quit  
12:36 <ol-ow2> Hi ! i'm trying to get value of "obfuscateEmailAddresses" from XWiki.XWikiPreferences with a $wiki.getDocument & a getObject('XWiki.XWikiPreferences'), so when i'm doing a getProperty('obfuscateEmailAddresses').value NULL returned, not object found .. What i'm doing wrong ? tmortagne vmassol mflorea  
12:41 <vmassol> has quit  
12:57 <mflorea> ol-ow2: it means that property is not set. Note that the recent versions of XWiki don't use that property anymore. Check the displayer\_email.vm template  
13:02 <ol-ow2> many thanks ! mflorea  
13:17 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
13:18 <vmassol> ol-ow2: it's been moved to some other place  
13:19 <vmassol> it's now in Mail.MailConfig  
13:20 <vmassol> to get it  
13:21 <vmassol> (I think, checking)  
13:22 <vmassol> yep, defined in GeneralMailConfigClass  
13:23 <vmassol> see https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/ddd8cdd42889e9257bb5a441842a8c326f1734b7/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-mail/xwiki-platform-mail-ui/src/main/resources/Mail/GeneralMailConfigSheet.xml#L50-L50  
13:24 <vmassol> new xpoperty is "obfuscate"  
13:26 <vmassol> I have coded script services to access mailsender config but not for the obfuscate xproperty  
13:26 <vmassol> so you'll need to do what you're doing but on Mail.MailConfig  
13:27 <vmassol> and for the Mail.GeneralMailConfigClass xobject  
13:54 <ol-ow2> ok, thanks vmassol :)  
13:56 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: btw i think it would be nice to rename https://github.com/xwiki-contrib/xwiki-daemon/ since it's using the "xwiki" prefix which is kind of reserved for xwiki github org.  
13:57 <vmassol> (see http://contrib.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebHome#HChoosingthename)  
14:10 <vmassol> FYI  
14:10 <vmassol> we have 13 wathclist emails that didn't make it to the list ATM  
14:10 <vmassol> because they were too large  
14:11 <vmassol> over 100K  
14:11 <vmassol> I'm going to discard them  
14:11 <vmassol> ok?  
14:11 <vmassol> last one is from 2017/01/31  
14:11 <vmassol> unless someone prefers that I accept them  
14:11 <vmassol> actuall  
14:12 <vmassol> the limit is not 100K but 1GB  
14:12 <vmassol> 1MB  
14:12 <vmassol> "Message body is too big: 1726046 bytes with a limit of 1024 KB"  
14:12 <vmassol> so I'll discard them since 1MB is really large  
14:13 <vmassol> (imagine 13\*2MB\*800 …)  
14:13 <vmassol> I guess we'd need to improve the watchlist email  
14:36 <vmassol> tmortagne: let me know when you're done with contrib.xwiki.org  
14:38 <tmortagne> vmassol: you can go  
14:38 <vmassol> thx  
14:40 <vmassol> hey  
14:40 <vmassol> just realized that XWiki syntax is mentioned on http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Contrib/job/XWiki%20Contrib/job/application-antispam/job/master/badge/ :)  
14:40 <vmassol> nice!  
14:44 <vmassol> now need to fix all status badges ....  
14:44 <vmassol> that's painful and I wouldn't mind some help )  
14:44 <vmassol> :)  
14:44 <vmassol> I've updtaed http://contrib.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/#HREADME.mdTemplate  
14:45 <tmortagne> vmassol: wow great news for http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Contrib/job/XWiki%20Contrib/job/application-antispam/job/master/badge/ :)  
14:49 <vmassol> haha  
14:49 <vmassol> it was jerome velociter who submitted a PR  
14:49 <vmassol> https://github.com/jenkinsci/embeddable-build-status-plugin/commit/8e9eca87e462128af900486336c049e3167f7bec  
14:49 <vmassol> merged by jesse glick: https://github.com/jenkinsci/embeddable-build-status-plugin/commit/f0972489a3641cc61250385d1ac7da8be5d76310  
14:50 <tmortagne> never noticed it  
14:50 <vmassol> me neither  
15:04 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> has joined #xwiki  
15:05 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> Hi all. Is there a possibility to migrate data from Foswiki to xWiki?  
15:07 <vmassol> 2 sec xwikiorg\_guest\_7  
15:07 <vmassol> checking something  
15:07 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> ok  
15:09 <vmassol> xwikiorg\_guest\_7: hi, XWiki supports the twiki syntax to some extent but it's not complete I think. You could try it though and see what you get  
15:09 <vmassol> http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/PageEditing#HChoosingaSyntax  
15:09 <vmassol> there's no full scale converter though as we have for confluence or mediawiki  
15:10 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> Is it possible to import the data or do i have to copy everything manually?  
15:10 <vmassol> someone contributed this http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Import+from+TWiki+Python+Script but I don't know if it works or how good it is  
15:10 <vmassol> xwikiorg\_guest\_7: as I mentioned  
15:10 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> Ah, thats what i was searching for  
15:11 <vmassol> XWiki has some api to parse twiki syntax and convert it to xwiki syntax for ex  
15:11 <vmassol> see http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/PageEditing#HChoosingaSyntax  
15:12 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> Thats perfect, thank you very much for your help  
15:12 <vmassol> np  
15:12 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> Great day to you, cya :)  
15:12 <vmassol> bye  
15:12 <xwikiorg\_guest\_7> has quit  
15:14 <vmassol> too bad he's left  
15:14 <vmassol> I would have pointed him to http://rendering.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/#HDemo to try out how good or bad is our parsing of Twiki ;)  
15:32 <vmassol> has quit  
15:35 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
16:04 <vmassol> grrrrrr  
16:04 <vmassol> I hate that  
16:05 <vmassol> mflorea: any idea why 8.4.3 has CK 1.12 and 8.4.4 has CK 1.10?  
16:05 <vmassol> 8.4.3: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/blob/xwiki-enterprise-8.4.3/xwiki-enterprise-ui/xwiki-enterprise-ui-common/pom.xml  
16:05 <vmassol> 8.4.4: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/blob/xwiki-enterprise-8.4.4/xwiki-enterprise-ui/xwiki-enterprise-ui-common/pom.xml  
16:06 <vmassol> btw I see no version specified for the template app for 8.4.4  
16:11 <tmortagne> template version seems to be defined in XE root pom in 8.4.4  
16:11 <tmortagne> vmassol: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/bd4fe223e31f9943e2656c5bc30893aa8244b813  
16:11 <tmortagne> now the version downgrade of ckeditor indeed looks weird  
16:12 <mflorea> vmassol check the commits for http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XE-1607 . I committed on master, stable-8.4.x and stable-9.0.x  
16:12 <mflorea> there was no CK 1.12 when 8.4.3 was released  
16:13 <mflorea> and my commit was a few days ago  
16:13 <vmassol> could you explain why XE 8.4.3 says 1.12 for CK and 8.4.4 says 1.10?  
16:13 <tmortagne> mflorea: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/blob/xwiki-enterprise-8.4.3/xwiki-enterprise-ui/xwiki-enterprise-ui-common/pom.xml#L172  
16:13 <mflorea> I see there is a xwiki-enterprise-8.4.3 branch  
16:14 <mflorea> so the GitHub ui is showing the contents of this branch instead of the tag  
16:14 <mflorea> this branch was not there this morning. it was created today  
16:15 <tmortagne> vmassol: looks like the branch you created by mistake broken the tag of the same name  
16:15 <tmortagne> let me see if I can restore it, I did not pull yet  
16:15 <vmassol> indeed I viewed a branch that didn't exist and it has created it  
16:15 <vmassol> the tag should be at https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/blob/xwiki-enterprise-8.4.3/xwiki-enterprise-ui/xwiki-enterprise-ui-common/pom.xml  
16:15 <mflorea> "This branch is even with master."  
16:16 <vmassol> hmm same url for tag and branc  
16:17 <vmassol> @thomas: I can delete the branch  
16:17 <vmassol> let me know  
16:19 <vmassol> tmortagne: I can run: git push origin --delete xwiki-enterprise-8.4.3  
16:21 <vmassol> btw I don't see the branch when I run: git branch -a  
16:21 <tmortagne> should be ok now  
16:21 <vmassol> have you removed it already tmortagne?  
16:22 <tmortagne> "git push origin --delete xwiki-enterprise-8.4.3" does not really tell if you want to remove the branch or the tag  
16:22 <tmortagne> I wanted to be sure to find a safe way to explicitly remove the branch  
16:23 <vmassol> so what did you use?  
16:23 <tmortagne> I have done it from https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/branches  
16:23 <vmassol> nice ui  
16:23 <vmassol> how do you nav to it?  
16:24 <vmassol> found it  
16:24 <tmortagne> "branches" next to "commits"  
16:24 <tmortagne> it's so obvious that it took me ages to find it and I knew I was searching for something like this :)  
16:24 <tmortagne> https://github.com/blog/1377-create-and-delete-branches is not up to date  
16:28 <vmassol> thanks for your help  
16:30 <msmeria> has quit
